properties.script:
out0 = spark.sql(f"""
    SELECT
 '{Config.sourceSystem}'   AS SRC_SYS_CD,
 VBAK.bukrs_vf  AS COMPANY_CD,
 VBAK.vbeln AS SLS_ORDR_DOC_ID,
 VBAK.auart AS SLS_ORDR_TYPE_CD,
 TVAKT.bezei AS SLS_ORDR_TYPE_DESC,
 TRIM(VBAK.vgbel) AS SLS_ORDR_NUM_REF,
 TRIM(VBAK.ernam) AS CRT_BY,
 TRIM(VBAK.faksk) AS BILL_BLK_CD,
 TRIM(TVFST.vtext) AS BILL_BLK_DESC,
 TRIM(VBAK.lifsk) AS DELV_BLK_CD,
 TRIM(TVLST.vtext) AS DELV_BLK_DESC,
 TRIM(VBUK.cmgst) AS CR_CHK_TOT_STS_CD,
 CASE WHEN VBAK.aedat= '00000000' THEN NULL ELSE to_timestamp(VBAK.aedat, 'yyyyMMdd') END AS CHG_DTTM,
 TRIM(VBAK.bsark) AS CUST_PO_TYPE_CD,
 CASE WHEN VBAK.erdat = '00000000' OR VBAK.erzet = '00000000' THEN CAST(NULL AS TIMESTAMP) ELSE  to_timestamp(concat(VBAK.erdat,VBAK.erzet),'yyyyMMddHHmmss') END AS CRT_DTTM,
 CASE WHEN VBAK.guebg= '00000000' THEN CAST(NULL AS TIMESTAMP) ELSE to_timestamp(VBAK.guebg, 'yyyyMMdd') END AS VALID_FROM_DTTM,
 CASE WHEN VBAK.gueen= '00000000' THEN CAST(NULL AS TIMESTAMP) ELSE to_timestamp(VBAK.gueen, 'yyyyMMdd') END AS VALID_TO_DTTM,
 CASE WHEN VBAK.vdatu= '00000000' THEN CAST(NULL AS TIMESTAMP) ELSE to_timestamp(VBAK.vdatu, 'yyyyMMdd') END AS RQST_DELV_DTTM,
 TRIM(VBAK.kalsm) AS PRC_PCDR_CD,
 TRIM(VBAK.waerk) AS SLS_ORDR_CRNCY_CD,
 CAST(TRIM(VBAK.netwr) AS DECIMAL(18, 4)) AS NET_VAL_AMT,
 TRIM(VBAK.kunnr) AS SOLD_TO_CUST_NUM,
 TRIM(VBAK.vkorg) AS SALES_ORGANIZATION_CD,
 TRIM(TVKOT.vtext) AS SLORG_NM,
 TRIM(VBAK.vtweg) AS DSTR_CHNL_CD,
 TRIM(TVTWT.vtext) AS DSTR_CHNL_NM,
 TRIM(VBAK.spart) AS DIVISION_CD,
 TRIM(TSPAT.vtext) AS DIV_NM,
 TRIM(VBAK.vsbed) AS SHIPPING_COND_CD,
 TRIM(TVSBT.vtext) AS SHIPPING_COND_DESC,
 TRIM(VBAK.bstnk) AS CUST_PO_NUM,
 TRIM(VBAK.ihrez) AS PTNR_REF_CD,
 TRIM(VBAK.vbtyp) AS SLS_ORDR_CAT_CD,
 TRIM(VBAK.augru) AS SALES_ORDER_REASON_CD,
 TRIM(TVAUT.bezei) AS SLS_ORDR_RSN_DESC,
 TRIM(VBAK.vkbur) AS SLS_TERR_ID,
 TRIM(VBAK.vkgrp) AS SLS_GRP_CD,
 CASE WHEN VBAK.fmbdat= '00000000' THEN CAST(NULL AS TIMESTAMP) ELSE to_timestamp(VBAK.fmbdat, 'yyyyMMdd') END  AS ORIG_MATL_AVLBLTY_DTTM,
 TRIM(VBUK.abstk) AS REJ_TOT_STS_CD,
 TRIM(VBUK.bestk) AS CNFRM_STS_CD,
 TRIM(VBUK.buchk) AS PSTNG_BILL_STS_CD,
 TRIM(VBUK.fkivk) AS INTCO_BILL_TOT_STS_CD,
 TRIM(VBUK.fksak) AS ORDR_BILL_STS_CD,
 TRIM(VBUK.fkstk) AS BILL_STS_CD,
 TRIM(VBUK.gbstk) AS PRCSG_TOT_STS_CD,
 TRIM(VBUK.koquk) AS PICK_CNFRM_STS_CD,
 TRIM(VBUK.kostk) AS PICK_TOT_STS_CD,
 TRIM(VBUK.lfstk) AS DELV_STS_CD,
 TRIM(VBUK.lfgsk) AS DELV_TOT_STS_CD,
 TRIM(VBUK.lvstk) AS WM_TOT_STS_CD,
 TRIM(VBUK.pkstk) AS PACK_TOT_STS_CD,
 TRIM(VBUK.relik) AS INVC_LIST_STS_CD,
 TRIM(VBUK.rfgsk) AS REF_DOC_TOT_STS_CD,
 TRIM(VBUK.rfstk) AS REF_DOC_STS_CD,
 TRIM(VBUK.trsta) AS TRNSP_PLAN_STS_CD,
 TRIM(VBUK.uvals) AS ICMPT_TOT_STS_CD,
 TRIM(VBUK.uvfas) AS BILL_ICMPT_TOT_STS_CD,
 TRIM(VBUK.uvpak) AS PACKICMPT_STS_CD,
 TRIM(VBUK.uvpas) AS PACKICMPT_TOT_STS_CD,
 TRIM(VBUK.uvpik) AS PICKICMPT_STS_CD,
 TRIM(VBUK.uvpis) AS PICKICMPT_TOT_STS_CD,
 TRIM(VBUK.uvprs) AS PRCICMPT_STS_CD,
 TRIM(VBUK.uvvls) AS DELVICMPT_TOT_STS_CD,
 TRIM(VBUK.uvwas) AS GMICMPT_TOT_STS_CD,
 TRIM(VBUK.wbstk) AS GM_TOT_STS_CD,
 TRIM(VBUK.lsstk) AS DELV_BLK_STS_CD,
 TRIM(VBAK.autlf) AS CMPLT_DELV_CD,
 CASE WHEN VBAK.cmfre= '00000000' THEN CAST(NULL AS TIMESTAMP) ELSE to_timestamp(VBAK.cmfre, 'yyyyMMdd') END  AS RLSE_DTTM,
 TRIM(VBUK.cmps1) AS RESV_CD,
 TRIM(VBUK.uvall) AS OVRL_HDR_CD,
 TRIM(VBUK.fsstk) AS BILL_BLK_STS_CD,
 TRIM(VBUK.spstg) AS OVRL_BLK_STS_CD,
 TRIM(T176T.vtext) AS PO_TYPE_DESC,
 TRIM(VBAK.ktext) AS SRCH_ITM_PROD_PROPS,
 TRIM(TVAU.vauna) AS RETRO_BILL,
 CASE WHEN VBAK.audat= '00000000' THEN CAST(NULL AS TIMESTAMP) ELSE to_timestamp(VBAK.audat, 'yyyyMMdd') END  AS DOC_DTTM,
 TRIM(VBAK.gsber) AS BUSN_AREA,
 TRIM(VBAK.gskst) AS BUSN_AREA_CC,
 TRIM(VBAK.vbklt) AS SD_DOC_IN,
 TRIM(VBAK.fkara) AS ORDR_RLTD_BILL_TYPE,
 TRIM(VBAK.kostl) AS CC_CD,
 TRIM(VBAK.stafo) AS UPDT_GRP,
 TRIM(VBAK.kvgr1) AS CUST_GRP_1,
 TRIM(TVV1T.bezei) AS CUST_GRP_1_DESC,
 TRIM(VBAK.kvgr2) AS CUST_GRP_2,
 TRIM(TVV2T.bezei) AS CUST_GRP_2_DESC,
 TRIM(VBAK.kvgr3) AS CUST_GRP_3,
 TRIM(TVV3T.bezei) AS CUST_GRP_3_DESC,
 TRIM(VBAK.kvgr4) AS CUST_GRP_4,
 TRIM(TVV4T.bezei) AS CUST_GRP_4_DESC,
 TRIM(VBAK.kvgr5) AS CUST_GRP_5,
 TRIM(TVV5T.bezei) AS CUST_GRP_5_DESC,
 TRIM(VBAK.kokrs) AS CNTL_AREA,
 TRIM(VBAK.kurst) AS EXCH_RT_TYPE,
 TRIM(VBAK.kkber) AS CR_CNTL_AREA,
 TRIM(VBAK.ctlpc) AS CR_MGMT_RISK_CAT,
 TRIM(VBAK.taxk1) AS ALT_TAX_CLSN,
 TRIM(VBAK.taxk2) AS TAX_CLSN_2,
 TRIM(VBAK.taxk3) AS TAX_CLSN_3,
 TRIM(VBAK.taxk4) AS TAX_CLSN_4,
 TRIM(VBAK.taxk5) AS TAX_CLSN_5,
 TRIM(VBAK.taxk6) AS TAX_CLSN_6,
 TRIM(VBAK.taxk7) AS TAX_CLSN_7,
 TRIM(VBAK.taxk8) AS TAX_CLSN_8,
 TRIM(VBAK.taxk9) AS TAX_CLSN_9,
 TRIM(VBAK.xblnr) AS REF_DOC_NUM,
 TRIM(VBAK.aufnr) AS ORDR_NUM,
 TRIM(VBAK.stceg_l) AS TAX_DEST_CTRY,
 TRIM(VBAK.landtx) AS TAX_DPRT_CTRY,
 TRIM(VBAK.xegdr) AS IN_TRNGLR_DEAL_EU,
 TRIM(T001.butxt) AS CO_CD_DESC,
 NULL AS CLS_OF_TRD,
 NULL AS FORBID_SLS_IN
from
{Config.sourceDatabase}.vbak vbak
left join {Config.sourceDatabase}.TVAKT TVAKT on VBAK.AUART=TVAKT.AUART and TVAKT.mandt = '232' and TVAKT._deleted_ = 'F' and TVAKT.SPRAS ='E'
left join {Config.sourceDatabase}.TVFST TVFST on VBAK.FAKSK=TVFST.FAKSP and TVFST.mandt = '232' and TVFST._deleted_ = 'F' and TVFST.SPRAS ='E'
left join {Config.sourceDatabase}.TVLST TVLST on VBAK.LIFSK=TVLST.LIFSP and TVLST.mandt = '232' and TVLST._deleted_ = 'F' and TVLST.SPRAS ='E'
left join {Config.sourceDatabase}.TVKOT TVKOT on VBAK.VKORG=TVKOT.VKORG and TVKOT.mandt = '232' and TVKOT._deleted_ = 'F' and TVKOT.SPRAS ='E'
left join {Config.sourceDatabase}.TVTWT TVTWT on VBAK.VTWEG=TVTWT.VTWEG and TVTWT.mandt = '232' and TVTWT._deleted_ = 'F' and TVTWT.SPRAS ='E'
left join {Config.sourceDatabase}.TSPAT TSPAT on VBAK.SPART=TSPAT.SPART and TSPAT.mandt = '232' and TSPAT._deleted_ = 'F' and TSPAT.SPRAS ='E'
left join {Config.sourceDatabase}.TVSBT TVSBT on VBAK.VSBED=TVSBT.VSBED and TVSBT.mandt = '232' and TVSBT._deleted_ = 'F' and TVSBT.SPRAS ='E'
left join {Config.sourceDatabase}.TVAUT TVAUT on VBAK.AUGRU=TVAUT.AUGRU and TVAUT.mandt = '232' and TVAUT._deleted_ = 'F' and TVAUT.SPRAS ='E'
left join {Config.sourceDatabase}.VBUK  VBUK  on VBAK.VBELN=VBUK.VBELN  and VBUK.mandt = '232'  and VBUK._deleted_ = 'F'
left join {Config.sourceDatabase}.T176T T176T on VBAK.BSARK=T176T.BSARK and T176T.mandt = '232' and T176T._deleted_ = 'F' and T176T.SPRAS ='E'
left join {Config.sourceDatabase}.TVAU TVAU   on VBAK.AUGRU=TVAU.AUGRU  and TVAU.mandt = '232'  and TVAU._deleted_ = 'F'
left join {Config.sourceDatabase}.TVV1T TVV1T on VBAK.KVGR1=TVV1T.KVGR1 and TVV1T.mandt = '232' and TVV1T._deleted_ = 'F' and TVV1T.SPRAS ='E'
left join {Config.sourceDatabase}.TVV2T TVV2T on VBAK.KVGR2=TVV2T.KVGR2 and TVV2T.mandt = '232' and TVV2T._deleted_ = 'F' and TVV2T.SPRAS ='E'
left join {Config.sourceDatabase}.TVV3T TVV3T on VBAK.KVGR3=TVV3T.KVGR3 and TVV3T.mandt = '232' and TVV3T._deleted_ = 'F' and TVV3T.SPRAS ='E'
left join {Config.sourceDatabase}.TVV4T TVV4T on VBAK.KVGR4=TVV4T.KVGR4 and TVV4T.mandt = '232' and TVV4T._deleted_ = 'F' and TVV4T.SPRAS ='E'
left join {Config.sourceDatabase}.TVV5T TVV5T on VBAK.KVGR5=TVV5T.KVGR5 and TVV5T.mandt = '232' and TVV5T._deleted_ = 'F' and TVV5T.SPRAS ='E'
left join {Config.sourceDatabase}.T001 T001 ON VBAK.BUKRS_VF=T001.BUKRS and T001.mandt = '232'  and T001._deleted_ = 'F' and T001.SPRAS ='E'
where vbak.mandt = '232' and vbak._deleted_ = 'F'  
 
""")
